statement: A 10 kg crate is pulled by 100 N on a horizontal surface. $\mu_k = 0.4$. Find friction force ($f_k$) and acceleration ($a$). Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
A 2 kg block is released from rest at the top of a 5 m tall frictionless incline. Find Potential Energy ($PE$) at the top and velocity ($v$) at the bottom. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
